messages.title: A PERSONAL MESSAGE FROM GAVIN BROWN
messages.content:
Dear Resident,
Over the last four years it has been a privilege to serve as a Member of the Scottish Parliament for the Lothians Region. I am writing to ask for your support in the election on 5th May so that I can continue to work on your behalf at Holyrood.

messages.title: GAVIN BROWN: A RECORD OF ACTION
messages.content:
EDINBURGH AIRPORT DROP-OFF CHARGES
Gavin started and led the campaign against drop off charges at Edinburgh Airport.

CAMPAIGNING TO GET LOCAL ROADS FIXED
Gavin has pressed the local Council to fix roads across the area over the last two years. He has also campaigned for constituents to have the Rosedale Road maintenance postponed to a less disruptive time than the school winter weather.

CAMPAIGNING TO KEEP THE BINS CLEAN
Gavin has acted on behalf of many local residents over referral issues. He has also launched a weekly inspection of bin collections to improve rubbish collection.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have lived in the south of the city for many years. I am aware of the issues that matter to local residents and have knocked on most of the doors personally over the years.
